Text.Page:
Tempest sirens have brought intense cold to this land, causing our soldiers to fight both the weather and the enemy.

The weather has no effect on Thulsa's minions, because they're either dead or fur-covered animals. That leaves us as the only ones suffering in the cold.

Take care of the tempest sirens, will you?

Finally, I can feel the warmth of sunlight again.

At least a little. Thanks, !
